special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: . While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: . The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Drop
actions.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the piercer. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 (6d6).

name: Piercer
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 8
